results.title: Evaluation of the Effectiveness of Post-Stroke Metformin Treatment Using Permanent Middle Cerebral Artery Occlusion in Rats
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to evaluate the neuroprotective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment after permanent @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@middle cerebral artery occlusion@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@pMCAO@@@) without reperfusion in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Zemgulyte G, Tanaka S, Hide I, Sakai N, Pampuscenko K, Borutaite V, Rastenyte D. Evaluation of the Effectiveness of Post-Stroke Metformin Treatment Using Permanent Middle Cerebral Artery Occlusion in Rats Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2021 Apr 1;14(4):. PMID: 33915857

results.title: Metformin prevents stroke damage in non-diabetic female mice with chronic kidney disease
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ were then allocated to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (200 mg/kg/day) or vehicle for 5 weeks until @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ induction by @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@transient middle cerebral artery occlusion@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@tMCAO@@@).

results.title: Neuroprotective Effects of Long-Term Metformin Preconditioning on Rats with Ischemic Brain Injuries.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Twenty-five Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly divided into 5 groups: sham group, @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@middle cerebral artery occlusion@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@) group, normal saline + @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@ group, pre- @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@ group, and 3-MA + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Wang A, Guo H, Zhang Z, Wang S, Pei T, Liu Z, Yang D, Liu Y, Ruan C. Neuroprotective Effects of Long-Term Metformin Preconditioning on Rats with Ischemic Brain Injuries. Eur Neurol. 2021;84(3):212-218. PMID: 33845479

results.title: Metformin attenuates blood-brain barrier disruption in mice following middle cerebral artery occlusion
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuates blood-brain barrier disruption in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ following @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@middle cerebral artery occlusion@@@

results.title: Metformin promotes focal angiogenesis and neurogenesis in mice following middle cerebral artery occlusion.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ promotes focal angiogenesis and neurogenesis in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ following @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@middle cerebral artery occlusion@@@.

results.title: Pre-stroke Metformin Treatment is Neuroprotective Involving AMPK Reduction.
results.text_hl: In transient @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ showed no neuroprotection even with pretreatment.

citations.NLM: Deng T, Zheng YR, Hou WW, Yuan Y, Shen Z, Wu XL, Chen Y, Zhang LS, Hu WW, Chen Z, Zhang XN. Pre-stroke Metformin Treatment is Neuroprotective Involving AMPK Reduction. Neurochem Res. 2016 Oct;41(10):2719-2727. PMID: 27350579

results.title: To Use or Not to Use Metformin in Cerebral Ischemia: A Review of the Application of Metformin in Stroke Rodents
results.text_hl: Liu et al. described the protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (200 mg/kg intraperitoneally) through altering the blood-brain barrier subsequent to @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@ for 90 minutes in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by decreasing its permeability.

citations.NLM: Arbeláez-Quintero I, Palacios M. To Use or Not to Use Metformin in Cerebral Ischemia: A Review of the Application of Metformin in Stroke Rodents Stroke Res Treat. 2017;2017():9756429. PMID: 28634570

results.title: Improvement of functional recovery by chronic metformin treatment is associated with enhanced alternative activation of microglia/macrophages and increased angiogenesis and neurogenesis following experimental stroke.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ were randomly divided to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or vehicle daily beginning at 24h after @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@middle cerebral artery occlusion@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@).

Improvement of functional recovery by chronic metformin treatment is associated with enhanced alternative activation of microglia/macrophages and increased angiogenesis and neurogenesis following experimental stroke. results.title: Chronic Metformin Preconditioning Provides Neuroprotection via Suppression of NF-kappaB-Mediated Inflammatory Pathway in Rats with Permanent Cerebral Ischemia.
results.text_hl: Male Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were treated with vehicle or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (50 mg/kg daily, i.p.) for 3 weeks and were subjected to permanent @<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@middle cerebral artery occlusion@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@pMCAO@@@).

citations.NLM: Zhu XC, Jiang T, Zhang QQ, Cao L, Tan MS, Wang HF, Ding ZZ, Tan L, Yu JT. Chronic Metformin Preconditioning Provides Neuroprotection via Suppression of NF-kappaB-Mediated Inflammatory Pathway in Rats with Permanent Cerebral Ischemia. Mol Neurobiol. 2015 Aug;52(1):375-85. PMID: 25172433
